VideoOverlay.setSize

Function/Meaning
Specifies the size of the playback rectangle
Type
Method of the VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setSize(width, height)
Arguments
width Specifies the width of the rectangular area for media playback.
height Specifies the height of the rectangular area for media playback.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Specifies the size of the rectangular area for media playback in pixels.
In the current version, this method cannot be used during layer playback.
